talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yes. <sp:5:0:0>This green thing is called a
<clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The one I am inspecting is known as a
<clr:0000>fan<clr:ffff>. It <clr:0000>activates<clr:ffff> when <clr:0000>struck <clr:ffff>to generate
wind on demand.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think>This river is meltwater. <sp:5:0:0>Falling into it will
quickly sap your stamina.<sp:0:4:0>It is for this reason that I maintain rafts
to cross to the other bank.
talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Energy Cells<clr:ffff> store the <clr:0000>energy <clr:ffff>required to
use a Zonai device.<sp:0:4:0>This <clr:0000>energy <clr:ffff>will replenish automatically
when the <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff> is not in use.<sp:0:4:0>Be mindful of your <clr:0000>energy<clr:ffff> reserves. <sp:5:0:0>It
would be unfortunate to run out mid-use.
talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseL>I remind you that these rafts are
undergoing maintenance.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Using one would be far too dangerous.<sp:5:0:0>
The rafts by the riverside are available in
the meantime.
talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This green thing is called a <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>This is a <clr:0000>fan<clr:ffff>-type device. <sp:5:0:0>It activates
when <clr:0000>struck <clr:ffff>to generate wind.
talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The rafts by the riverside are there for
your use. <sp:5:0:0>Excuse me as I continue
my work.
talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseL>I repeat that these rafts are undergoing
maintenance. <sp:5:0:0>Using an unserviced and
uninspected raft is not recommended.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The rafts by the riverside are tested and
perfectly serviceable.
talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I should mention that energy is essential
for using a <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>You will need an <clr:0000>Energy Cell <clr:ffff>if you want
to use one.
talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My duties today are complete. <sp:5:0:0>The rafts
and <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> are in working order.<sp:5:0:0>
Tomorrow my duties begin once more.
talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>This is a problem. <sp:5:0:0>You do not seem to
have an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>It will be impossible for you to use any
<clr:0000>Zonai devices <clr:ffff>without an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> are essential on this island.<sp:5:0:0>
I will give you a spare <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It is what powers this raft.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff> currently in use is the
<clr:0000>fan<clr:ffff>-type model.<sp:0:4:0>It activates when <clr:0000>struck <clr:ffff>to generate wind.
Remember to board the raft before you
strike the <clr:0000>fan<clr:ffff>.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>The rafts by the bank are fully operational.<sp:5:0:0>
Use them with confidence.
talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yes. <sp:5:0:0>The green thing attached to the raft<sp:5:0:0>
is called a <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>This model is a <clr:0000>fan<clr:ffff>-type Zonai device.<sp:5:0:0>
It actives when <clr:0000>struck<clr:ffff> to generate wind.
talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Please activate the <clr:0000>Zonai device <clr:ffff>if you
want to use a raft.
talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I am at rest. <sp:5:0:0>Feel free in the meantime
to use the fully inspected rafts by
the riverside.
talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>Hmm. It has grown late. <sp:5:0:0>I was too
immersed in my duties to notice.<sp:0:4:0>I will rest until the next time bell chimes.<sp:5:0:0>
Do not hesitate to disturb me if the
need arises.
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I see that you already have one. <sp:5:0:0>That is
a relief.<sp:0:4:0>Allow me to review how it works.
talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My duties today are complete. <sp:5:0:0>The rafts
and <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> are in working order.
talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>One moment. <sp:5:0:0>You do not have an
<clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> cannot be operated without
an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>This means you will also be unable to
move the raft.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Zonai devices are a necessity on this
island. <sp:5:0:0>I do have a spare <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.
I will offer it to you.
talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Energy Cells<clr:ffff> store the <clr:0000>energy<clr:ffff> required to
use a Zonai device.<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy><clr:ffff>This <clr:0000>energy<clr:ffff> will replenish automatically
when the Zonai device is not in use.<sp:0:4:0>Be mindful of your <clr:0000>energy<clr:ffff> reserves. <sp:5:0:0>It
would be unfortunate to run out mid-use.<sp:0:4:0>The rafts by the riverside have been
thoroughly inspected. <sp:5:0:0>They are ready for
your use in crossing the waters.
talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff> contains the <clr:0000>energy<clr:ffff>
required to operate Zonai devices.<sp:0:4:0>This <clr:0000>energy <clr:ffff>will replenish automatically
when the <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff> is not in use.<sp:0:4:0>Be mindful of your <clr:0000>energy<clr:ffff> reserves. <sp:5:0:0>It
would be unfortunate to run out mid-use.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>This will enable you to pilot the rafts by
the riverside. <sp:5:0:0>They are yours to use if you
want to cross the waters.
talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Ah. <sp:5:1:0>Pardon my rudeness. <sp:5:0:0>Do you require
a raft?<sp:0:4:0>The ones by the riverbank are ready
for use.<sp:5:0:0> The <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff> has also
been inspected.
talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS>Using a Zonai device will deplete the
<clr:0000>energy<clr:ffff> in your <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>This <clr:0000>energy<clr:ffff> will automatically replenish.<sp:5:0:0>
But be careful that your <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff> does
not run out while using a Zonai device.
talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS>Ahem. <sp:5:0:0>These rafts are in for maintenance.<sp:0:4:0>The rafts by the riverside are available for
those in need of one.
talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Using a Zonai device will deplete the

But be careful that your <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff> does
not run out while using a Zonai device.
talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Using a Zonai device will deplete the
<clr:0000>energy<clr:ffff> in your <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>This <clr:0000>energy<clr:ffff> will automatically replenish.<sp:5:0:0>
But be careful that your <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff> does
not run out while using a Zonai device.
talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS>Ahem. <sp:5:0:0>These rafts are in for maintenance.<sp:0:4:0>People keep trying to use unserviced and
uninspected rafts. <sp:5:0:0>This makes me anxious.<sp:0:4:0>I recommend the rafts by the riverside if
you have need of one.
